message: All done! What's next on the agenda?

function.arguments: {"message":"I explored the repository, located the SpanSelector and ToolLineHandles implementation, reproduced the issue locally by creating a reproduction script (reproduce_issue.py), implemented a minimal fix to prevent ToolLineHandles from affecting axis autoscaling when creating handle lines by temporarily disabling autoscale on the relevant axis, committed the change, and saved the git diff to /workspace/diff.txt. The diff file contains the change to lib/matplotlib/widgets.py."}
function.name: finish

args.final_thought: I explored the repository, located the SpanSelector and ToolLineHandles implementation, reproduced the issue locally by creating a reproduction script (reproduce_issue.py), implemented a minimal fix to prevent ToolLineHandles from affecting axis autoscaling when creating handle lines by temporarily disabling autoscale on the relevant axis, committed the change, and saved the git diff to /workspace/diff.txt. The diff file contains the change to lib/matplotlib/widgets.py.
